question: Which two veteran actresses received the Akkineni Nageswara Rao (ANR) National Award for the years 2019 and 2018, respectively?
explanation:
Veteran actor Rekha and the late Sridevi conferred the Akkineni Nageswara Rao (ANR) National Award for the years 2019 and 2018, announced actor Nagarjuna in the presence of industrialist T Subbarami Reddy at an event held in Hyderabad.
Instituted by the Akkineni International Foundation to honour ANR, the awards were presented at Annapurna Studios in the presence of actor Chiranjeevi and other Telugu cinema dignitaries.
